issue.title: [CF 1094] proc/buff used up, timer keeps running
issue.body:
I've noticed a bug with a buff icon on my Retribution Paladin which I've not noticed on any other buff or on any other toon - either the problem is limited to this buff (or a few number of buffs), or I just did not notice it anywhere else so far, as there was an update to TMW just yesterday, so the bug might have been introduced in that version (7.2.4-6-gd918c1e). Therefor I will describe the bug for this specific situation.

The problem affects the buff you get from the "Empowered Divine Storm" passive: each time you use your holy power, you have a chance to be able to use your next Divine Storm for free. When this ability procs, you get a buff called "Divine Crusader" which lasts 12 seconds and is consumed the next time you use an ability that costs holy power.

I am tracking this buff through an icon which is always shown and uses the timer animation to display the remaning time (export string below). In the past, when I used up the buff, the timer on that icon would just disappear, as expected. Now, whenever I gain the buff, the timer starts running and the icon displays a small number "1" in the lower right corner, which I think is new (seems to be the buff's stacks, although this buff can never have more than one stack, so this info is not needed at all). When I use up the buff, the small number "1" disappears, but the timer just keeps running, which is very irritating, as the buff is actually gone, as my buff bar confirmed.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.2.4-6-gd918c1e
I'm not sure if this is the version the issue showed up for the first time, as I have not played my ret paladin for a week or two. I've never had this problem before, though, so it must have been introduced pretty recently.

Do you have an error log of what happened?
